ggnr.title: Cariñosos ususarios de GaGaHi:
ggnr.nr1: Como la nueva versión de GaGaHi está funcionando de prueba
ggnr.nr2: ，Los oros de usuarios de versión vieja y derechos de usuarios aún no se puede utilizar en la versión nueva, ¡por favor que lo entienda!

fhlb.nr1: Now the new version of GaGaHi has been online for a week, some of the users are used to the old version of GaGaHi, so it takes time to adopt to the new version. While providing high quality services, in order to meet the needs of some users, we add [Go to the old version] entrance. You can click it to return to the old website.
fhlb.nr2: The messages on the old website and the new website are independent, the current gold amount and member level are available on both new and old website. When golds run out or membership expires, recharge and upgrade on the new version and old version will be totally separated. You can freely choose new version or old version to make friends according to your preference. We are also very grateful to our user's long-standing understanding and support.
